nodes.text: Narmle Memorial Rally was an illegal swoop racing competition held on the moon of Rori, during the height of the New Order. The track weaved through the streets of Narmle and in the neighboring swamp. Legends said that this track retraced a route used by the local smuggler Trein Veltin, who tried to elude the authorities intent on his arrest. His escape was cut short due to a fatal collision with a flesh eating chuba. Since that incident many swoop racers have raced this track in his memory. Eventually it became a semi-formal track for an illegal street race.
Dash Rendar and Kimmi Chyler run in the Narmle Memorial Rally after the Battle of Yavin.

The Narmle Memorial Rally appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The Narmle Memorial Rally was added to the game with an update released on December 20, 2004.
